DOC.brief_summary: This study efficacy evaluation Dotarem®-enhanced magnetic resonance angiography ( MRA ) compare Gadovist®-enhanced MRA diagnosis clinically significant abdominal low limb arterial disease .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Evaluation Dotarem Compared Gadovist Diagnosis Peripheral Arterial Disease
DOC.criteria: Male female , age ≥ 18 year . Patient infrarenal aorta chronic lower limb ischemia various clinical sign gravity ( stage IIIV accord classification Leriche Fontaine ) or/and Doppler ultrasonography indicate abdominal low limb arteriopathy . Patient schedule conventional XRay angiography ( intraarterial Digital Substraction Angiography = DSA ) within 30 day MRA minimum time interval least 24 hour 2 examination . Patient plan undergo therapeutic intervention abdominal low limb vessel time MRA Xray Angiography perform . Patient major cardiovascular event within 30 day prior inclusion . Patient treat unilateral hip replacement , abdominal aortic iliac graft stent .
